title: Tuition Management System
shortDescription: A full-featured platform for students, tutors, and admins to manage tuition activities efficiently.
fullDescription: The Tuition Management System is a complete digital platform designed to solve real-world problems of finding qualified tutors and verified tuition posts. It supports student, tutor, and admin roles with secure authentication, tuition posting, tutor applications, payment tracking, and financial reporting.
purpose: To provide a smooth, secure, and reliable digital workflow for tuition management while ensuring verified tutors and trusted tuition posts.

studentDashboard: Create, update, and delete tuition posts
adminDashboard: User management (view, update, delete, change roles)

title: Film Review
shortDescription: An interactive movie platform where users can explore, rate, and review movies.
fullDescription: Film Review is a community-driven web application for movie lovers to discover new and popular movies, share opinions, rate films, and manage personal watchlists. The platform provides real-time movie data with a clean and responsive user interface.
purpose: To create an engaging space for movie enthusiasts where they can explore movies, share reviews, and maintain a personalized watchlist.
features: Dynamic movie listing using real-time API data
Search and filter movies by name or genre
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
additionalFeatures: Display movie details like release year, genre, and rating
Admin/creator control to add, edit, and delete movies
